property.name: anonymization-rules-content
property.description: Rules that define what all to anonymize. Please be aware that more rules can result in to slowness of bundle capture as well as may consume more CPU. These rules are sensitive to formats, make sure that the modified content is a valid json document.
property.value: { "rules":[ { "name": "IP Address", "description": "Anonymize IP addresses like 123.123.12.34 from all non-binary files", "rule_id": "Pattern", "patterns":
